properties.description: A humanized monoclonal antibody that binds specifically to TNF-ALPHA and blocks its interaction with endogenous TNF RECEPTORS to modulate INFLAMMATION. It is used in the treatment of RHEUMATOID ARTHRITIS; PSORIATIC ARTHRITIS; CROHN'S DISEASE and ULCERATIVE COLITIS.

A chronic suppurative and cicatricial disease of the apocrine glands occurring chiefly in the axillae in women and in the groin and anal regions in men. It is characterized by poral occlusion with secondary bacterial infection, evolving into abscesses which eventually rupture. As the disease becomes chronic, ulcers appear, sinus tracts enlarge, fistulas develop, and fibrosis and scarring become evident.
A humanized monoclonal antibody that binds to IL-12 and IL-23 and is used as a DERMATOLOGIC AGENT in the treatment of patients with plaque PSORIASIS who have not responded to other therapies.

properties.text:
Lol no

This is all wrong, all of it. But I'll start from the top.

Hidradenitis Suppurativa does not specifically target plus size or overweight people. In fact, medical research doesn't even know what causes. Weight could be a factor, could also not be one at all. https://t.co/ZH99GP1SLs

properties.text: @Cardia_Chaotic @HelHathSomeFury People with hidradenitis suppurativa (an excruciatingly painful and disfiguring condition) have to wear different clothing to accommodate their pain. I for example like tight clothing, but I too find bikini cut really painful at times. Others like loose clothing and boyshorts

Top 5 easy DIY ways to remove & clear HS in 7 days

- Reduce fatty foods in your diet
- Wear clean & better fitting underwears 
- Scrub that area twice a week 
- Diluted dettol & cotton swab everyday at night 
- moisturize that area with quick absorbing oils eg: almond or bio oil

@packedpinchieez @trippykay4202 Preaching to the choir...... I have Hidradenitis suppurativa, CPTSD, Severe anxiety, severe depression & OCD üò¨üò≥ HS is the worst with pain that you must hide and that gets your depression going and it just snowballs. Must medicate to keep the humor going to hide everything! https://t.co/hzp7DcnZEC
Hidradenitis Suppurativa playing up in amongst all that. Jeezo man. No wonder I need a rest
@melanatedmomma Inflamed constantly since i have hidradenitis suppurativa

Still so much to do about #disease #Awareness in #FamilyMedicine 
See also #Hidradenitis Suppurativa in General Practice: A Pilot Study. Farida Benhadou, et al.
DOI: 10.4172/2329-9126.1000207 https://t.co/AIk9ayTaYe
Family Physicians‚Äô Awareness and General Knowledge of Hidradenitis Suppurativa: A Survey Research https://t.co/qDYmqOgp8p

Finally doing my thread on HS. It‚Äôll be a combination of 3 abnormalities with the sweat glands: 

- Hidradenitis Suppurativa (HS)
- Hyperhidrosis (primary and secondary)
- Body odor (Bromhidrosis)

I‚Äôll also finally be reviewing the @necessaire deodorant after 7 months of use!

Before Foundation. https://t.co/ZsbKSeXslK

‚ÄúIt pays to be obvious, especially if you have a reputation for subtlety.‚Äù ‚Äï Isaac Asimov, Foundation https://t.co/CwnxHemqyE https://t.co/SSKeDD3lTP

I know with Hidradenitis suppurativa you aren‚Äôt supposed to wear deodorant..but let me hand it to you,this condition makes you have horrible BO.For u female #Hidradenitissuppurativa warriors this deodorant is THE best I‚Äôve found for covering the smell. @SecretDeodorant THANK YOU https://t.co/iqLEYPW5Cw

#HidradenitisSuppurativa Research - Issue #2: ORIGIN | Who am I? What is HS? Where is HS? Why is HS? #PublicHealth #MedicalResearch #History @UNESCO @UNHumanRights @AusHumanRights https://t.co/fglFvHnwYK via @revue
Should we be checking Vitamin D levels in patients with #hidradenitis suppurativa? https://t.co/FdfCHeduqL @GinetteOkoye #HS #Hidradenitissuppurativa

I am a transmasc lesbian with H cups, hidradenitis suppurativa, and worsening scoliosis. I have had to quit jobs that gave me any sort of financial security because of the pain. The dysphoria is overwhelming especially when I can‚Äôt even properly bind.
